channel.title: Read if you can only get 4 people in your server!
channel.description:
Go to the compile.BAT, and make it look like this.
[code] @echo off title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java JAVA -Xmx1024m server "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin\java.exe" server pause[/code]
There you go, more than 4 people can get on now.

item.title: Read if you can only get 4 people in your server!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Go to the compile.BAT, and make it look like this.

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java JAVA -Xmx1024m server "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin\java.exe" server pause

There you go, more than 4 people can get on now.
